Heroku

20 Jun 2014

Today we're going to put our applications up on Heroku.

brew install heroku

Heroku allows us to easily deploy our applications and not have to worry too much about creating a production environment. It also simplifies deployment significantly. Simply git push and your app will be updated! It's free to get started. Their pitch is easy scalability, but it certainly comes at a price.

A concrete example is available, but Heroku has a great guide for setting up Node.js. They also have good documentation for getting Postgres set up on their platform.

Challenge

  • Follow the instructions on the example to deploy a pre-defined app.
  • Deploy one of the apps that you've worked on that work with Bookshelf.js and Express.
